name: Beet and Blueberry Mini Loaf
description: Beet and blueberry mini loaf. A delicious, brightly colored mini loaf that's great for breakfast or snacking on. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent agave/maple syrup
1 medium beet (, peeled and chopped (about 1/2 cup chopped))

recipeInstructions.text: Add the yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar to 1/4 cup (60ml) warm water and mix well. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar to 1/4 cup (60ml) warm water and mix well. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, puree the beet and blueberries with the remaining sugar and flax meal and some warm water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, puree the beet and blueberries with the remaining sugar and flax meal and some warm water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl add the flours, pumpkin pie spice, wheat gluten and salt and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl add the flours, pumpkin pie spice, wheat gluten and salt and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture, oil and beet blueberry puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture, oil and beet blueberry puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead the dough for 8-10 minutes, scraping sides every 2-3 minutes if using a stand mixer. add more flour or water in little quantities if needed. As with any fresh fruit/vegetable bread, the fruit gives out a little extra moisture than a normal bread while the dough sits for the rising time. The dough should be soft and not too sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead the dough for 8-10 minutes, scraping sides every 2-3 minutes if using a stand mixer. add more flour or water in little quantities if needed. As with any fresh fruit/vegetable bread, the fruit gives out a little extra moisture than a normal bread while the dough sits for the rising time. The dough should be soft and not too sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz the top of dough with some oil spray. Place dough in a covered container in a warm place for 1.5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Spritz the top of dough with some oil spray. Place dough in a covered container in a warm place for 1.5 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch it lightly. For mini loaf pans, divide dough into 2 parts. Knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides, or by rolling it out into a rectangle and rolling the rectangle from one side and tucking the other edge under.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch it lightly. For mini loaf pans, divide dough into 2 parts. Knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides, or by rolling it out into a rectangle and rolling the rectangle from one side and tucking the other edge under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in greased mini bread pans. Spritz the top with water and then spritz a little oil spray and cover with damp towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in greased mini bread pans. Spritz the top with water and then spritz a little oil spray and cover with damp towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Place it in a warm place or warm oven for 50 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place it in a warm place or warm oven for 50 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove towel, spritz top with some water and bake at 365 degrees F for 25 minutes. (30 minutes if baking one loaf)
recipeInstructions.name: Remove towel, spritz top with some water and bake at 365 degrees F for 25 minutes. (30 minutes if baking one loaf)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove bread from pan and let cool for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove bread from pan and let cool for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice and enjoy as is, topped with the creamy herbed berry topping( vegan cream cheese mixed with mashed berries and herbs), or marmalade, or nut butters, or topped with a tofu scramble!
recipeInstructions.name: Slice and enjoy as is, topped with the creamy herbed berry topping( vegan cream cheese mixed with mashed berries and herbs), or marmalade, or nut butters, or topped with a tofu scramble!

keywords: colorful food, vegan bread recipe, vegetable bread
